item.title: Report X-2023071169
item.description:
Report X-2023071169

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-18
  • City: CARENCRO
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE CAME OUT OF UNLOAD AREA DAMAGED. PACKAGE WAS WET. PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO QA PROCESSING AREA. UPON INSPECTION DISCOVERED 1 GALLON OF DETERGENT HAD LOOSE CAP. A QUART OF LIQUID LEAKED OUT INTO BOX AND ON ALL CONTENTS. PACKAGE WAS PLACED INSIDE HAZMAT BAG THEN HAZMAT DRUM AND PROCESSED. DescribePack: ONE CAP ON ONE GALLON OF DETERGENT WAS LOOSE AND LIQUID LEAKED OUT INTO BOX. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: AS SOON AS WETNESS WAS DISCOVERED ON PACKAGE, PACKAGE WAS BROUGHT TO QA PROCESSING AREA. PACKAGE WAS THEN PLACED IN HAZMAT BAG THEN HAZMAT DRUM.
